data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gremio's half?
In the minute 1, Gremio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ceara have a goal kick.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
Throw-in Gremio.
Ball safe as Ceara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 5, In Porto Alegre Ceara drive forward through Cleber Bomfim. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Gremio drive upfield and Pepe gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Ceara defender.
Gremio are pushing forward but Jean Pyerre's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 6, Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
Throw-in for Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 10, Important block from the Ceara defence as Diego Souza fires in a strike for Gremio.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a throw-in for Gremio, close to Ceara's area.
Paulo Miranda is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a Gremio throw-in in Ceara's half.
In the minute 13, The home team has substituted Paulo Miranda with David Braz. Renato Gaucho is thus making his first change.
In the minute 14, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Gremio.
Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Ceara.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Gremio territory.
In the minute 17, Jean Pyerre gets his shot on target but fails to score for Gremio.
Free kick in a good position for Gremio!
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Jean Pyerre.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ceara will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Gremio.
In the minute 26, Gremio pushes forward through Victor Ferraz, whose finish on goal is saved.
Ceara's Fabinho breaks free at Arena do Gremio. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards Gremio a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Gremio drives forward and Diego Souza gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Gremio territory.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 32, Gremio push forward at Arena do Gremio and Luiz Fernando gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Ceara defence.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 33, Gremio take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Pepe.
That's a fine assist from Luiz Fernando.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Pepe for Gremio who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 36, Cleber Bomfim (Ceara) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Goal! The away team reduce the deficit to 2-1 through a strike by Kelvyn Ramos da Fonseca. .
Great play from Cleber Bomfim to set up the goal.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Ceara at Arena do Gremio.
Free kick for Gremio in the half of Ceara.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 40, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal! Diego Souza extends Gremio's lead to 3-1.
Luiz Fernando instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 41, Pepe is back on his feet again.
Goal kick for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
Free kick Ceara.
In the minute 43, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Ceara.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ceara have been awarded a corner by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior.
In the minute 45, Tiago (Ceara) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards Gremio a goal kick.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a Ceara throw-in in Gremio's half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Gremio.
Throw-in for Ceara close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, The away team have replaced Ricardinho with Charles. This is the first substitution made today by Guto Ferreira.
Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gremio's Jean Pyerre gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 51, Ceara have a goal kick.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 54, In Porto Alegre Gremio attack through Luiz Fernando. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Ceara at Arena do Gremio.
Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Gremio.
In the minute 60, Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Gremio drive forward but Pepe is judged offside.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Gremio.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Ceara make their second substitution with Victor Jacare replacing Mateus.
In the minute 63, Can Gremio capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ceara's half?
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gremio's half?
In the minute 66, Guto Ferreira (Ceara) is making a third substitution, with Wescley replacing Kelvyn Ramos da Fonseca.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Matheus Henrique.
In the minute 69, Matheus Henrique is back on the pitch.
In the minute 70, Corner awarded to Gremio.
Diego Churin is on a sub for Diego Souza for Gremio.
The home team replace Pepe with Everton.
Goal! Diego Churin extends Gremio's lead to 4-1 in Porto Alegre with a header.
Jean Pyerre with an assist there.
In the minute 73, Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Gremio.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Gremio in the half of Ceara.
Ceara are coming forward and Cleber Bomfim gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Gremio goal kick.
In the minute 77, Renato Gaucho (Gremio) has taken off Matheus Henrique who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Thaciano is the replacement.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Renato Gaucho is making the team's fifth substitution at Arena do Gremio with Lucas Silva replacing Darlan Mendes.
Throw-in for Ceara at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 79, Felipe Vizeu is replacing Cleber Bomfim for the away team.
Pedro Naressi is replacing Fabinho for Ceara at Arena do Gremio.
Free kick Gremio.
In the minute 83, Pedro Naressi for Ceara has been booked by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
David Braz hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Gremio.
In the minute 85, Diego Churin (Gremio) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
In Porto Alegre, Thaciano of Gremio is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 87, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
David Braz (Gremio) has received a first yellow card.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 89, Ceara's Luiz Otavio misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto Alegre.
Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
Charles (Ceara) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ceara have been awarded a corner by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior will wait an extra 6 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a Ceara throw-in in Gremio's half.
Bruno Pacheco of Ceara gets in a strike, but is off target.
Gremio have a goal kick.
Victor Jacare of Ceara smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Ceara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
The second-half is over. The match ends 4-2.
Goal! A headed strike from the away team reduces their deficit to 4-2. Tiago got above everyone else to nod it in.
Great play from Samuel Xavier to set up the goal.
Ceara's Victor Jacare has been booked in Porto Alegre.
